sub_title: English-Russian translation | Localization | Working with agencies & individuals | Proofreading | Self-motivated with an eye for details | Remote\Online
summary:
As a recruiter, you need a translator who can deliver accurate and grammatically correct translations, within a tight deadline, and with attention to cultural nuances. You want to avoid errors and mistranslations that could harm your reputation.

Look no further. I am an independent English-Russian translator with excellent written skills, who is adaptable, flexible, and detail-oriented. I have been in the translation industry since 2000, working part-time as a qualified Russian (RFL) and English (EFL) teacher assistant, and became a full-time freelance translator in 2020.

Throughout my career, I have translated a diverse range of materials, from legal documents and press releases to stories, essays, and audio recordings. I have worked with various industries, including food, tourism, and gambling. My work is not just a job, but a passion that drives me to deliver the best possible outcome for every client.

I understand that every client has unique requirements, and I use my skills and experience to tailor my approach to meet those needs within the specified budget. When you work with me, you can trust that your job will be delivered on time, proofread and polished to perfection.

So, if you're looking for a translator who can provide you with outstanding results, look no further. Contact me today to discuss your translation needs, and I'll be more than happy to help you.

Kind regards,
Yulia Pemberton
